front.title: Extending Return Routability Procedure for Network Prefix (RRNP)

abstract.t: This memo highlights the inadequacy of existing return routability procedure when one takes network prefix into consideration under the context of route optimization with Network Mobility (NEMO). An extended return routability procedure, called Return Routability with Network Prefix (RRNP), is thus proposed to address this problem. With RRNP, a correspondent node can verify the collocation of care-of address, home address, and network prefix(es) specified in a binding update message.
